class.name: CompressedTextureLayered
class.brief_description: Base class for texture arrays that can optionally be compressed.
class.description: Base class for [CompressedTexture2DArray] and [CompressedTexture3D]. Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing the derived resource types. See also [TextureLayered].

members.member: The path the texture should be loaded from.
